results.name: Compound filter (for base-3 digit runlengths): a(n) = P(A290091(n), A290092(n)), where P(n,k) is sequence A000027 used as a pairing function.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..19683
xref: Cf. A006047, A053735, A290079 (some of the matched sequences).
